- This Application was made to display basic movie information from The Movie Database (TMDb). \n\n
- By selecting \"overview\" on any of the movie cards a dialog will appear with the overview supplied by TMDb. \n\n
- The menu overflow on the movie page\'s toolbar has different options to chose from to change filter used on TMDb.\n\n
- The refresh button on the movie page\'s toolbar will reload the list of movies based on the currently selected URL \n\n
- The info button on the movie page\'s toolbar will bring you to this page and the back button located above will return you to the movie page. \n\n
- All movie information is obtained through themoviedb.org \n\n
- Vector Resources such as the Refresh icon and Info icon were obtained through materialdesign.io/icons \n\n
- All quotes are from imdb.com
